title: Typeface Design Wiki
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018081354/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Wikis](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018081354/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Wikis) : typefacedesign.org**

The wiki of the MA Typeface Design programme at the [University of Reading](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018081354/http:/typophile.com/wiki/University%20of%20Reading) is an open, collaborative site which contains information about the MA program at Reading.

[http://wiki.typefacedesign.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018081354/http:/wiki.typefacedesign.org/ "http://wiki.typefacedesign.org")
author: paul d hunt
